query.name: com.authentica.seed.students.all

columns.column: stu_eval_lastevaldate stu_eval_parentalconsentdate stu_eval_schoolid stu_eval_specialedplacement stu_eval_specialedocation stu_eval_studenteligibility stu_section504_enddate stu_section504_notes stu_section504_startdate stu_title_enddate stu_title_startdate stu_title_program stu_title_i_extendime stu_title_i_instruct stu_title_i_support stu_unacc_youth_endate stu_unacc_youth_notes stu_unacc_youth_startate stu_virtual_startate stu_virtual_notes as stu_virtual_startdate stu_access_school stu_accountable_school stu_activeparent_duty stu_adm_type stu_alt_student stu_asc_grad_tf stu_choicescholarstu stu_country_origin stu_country_residence stu_doe_diploma_level stu_doe_diploma_type stu_emp_skills stu_eng_level stu_entry_datetoschool stu_esea_title_progam stu_except_primary stu_except_secondary stu_exclude_from_at stu_exclude_from_gr stu_exclude_from_lm_tf stu_exclude_from_me_tf stu_exclude_minsecdays stu_fasa_filed stu_foreign_exchange_tf stu_forster_care stu_grad_date stu_half_time_kg stu_hight_ability stu_homeless stu_instruct_mins stu_lep_yn stu_local_pathway stu_migrant_tf stu_mother_maiden_name stu_native_lang_c stu_post_grad_info stu_post_sec_compete stu_primaryschoolenroll stu_publish_sped stu_refugee_program as stu_section504_plan_tf stu_servicing_school stu_specialEd_tf stu_teacherofrecord stu_particiapnt_tf stu_unaccompanied_youth stu_virtual_student

query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT Students.Student_Number as student_id, Students.First_Name, Students.Middle_Name, Students.Last_Name, Students.DOB as birth_date, Students.Gender as sex, Students.Ethnicity as race, Students.FedEthnicity as federal_ethnicity_indicator, Students.City, Students.DistrictOfResidence, Students.EntryCode, Students.EntryDate, Students.ExitCode, Students.ExitComment, Students.ExitDate, Students.Grade_Level, Students.Home_Phone, Students.IN_native_language, Students.SpecialEducation, Students.State, Students.State_ExcludeFromRepo, Students.State_StudentNumber, Students.Street, Students.TransferComment, Students.Zip, EmailAddress.EmailAddress, S_IN_STU_ACTIVE_DUTY_C.Enddate as stu_active_enddate, S_IN_STU_ACTIVE_DUTY_C.Notes as stu_active_notes, S_IN_STU_ACTIVE_DUTY_C.Startdate as stu_active_startdate, S_IN_STU_ALTERNATIVE_EDU_C.Enddate as stu_alt_enddate, S_IN_STU_ALTERNATIVE_EDU_C.Notes as stu_alt_notes, S_IN_STU_ALTERNATIVE_EDU_C.Startdate as stu_alt_startdate, S_IN_STU_ALTERNATIVE_EDU_C.Programname as stu_alt_programname, S_IN_STU_FOSTER_CARE_C.Enddate as stu_foster_enddate, S_IN_STU_FOSTER_CARE_C.Notes as stu_foster_notes, S_IN_STU_FOSTER_CARE_C.Startdate as stu_foster_startdate, S_IN_STU_FRGNEXCHNG_C.Enddate as stu_frgnexchng_enddate, S_IN_STU_FRGNEXCHNG_C.Notes as stu_frgnexchng_notes, S_IN_STU_FRGNEXCHNG_C.Startdate as stu_frgnexchng_startdate, S_IN_STU_HIGH_ABILITY_C.Enddate as stu_ability_enddate, S_IN_STU_HIGH_ABILITY_C.Notes as stu_ability_notes, S_IN_STU_HIGH_ABILITY_C.Startdate as stu_ability_startdate, S_IN_STU_HIGH_ABILITY_C.Highability as stu_highability, S_IN_STU_HOMELESS_C.Enddate as stu_homeless_enddate, S_IN_STU_HOMELESS_C.Notes as stu_homeless_notes, S_IN_STU_HOMELESS_C.Startdate as stu_homeless_startdate, S_IN_STU_HOMELESS_C.PrimNightTimeResidenc as stu_homeless_prime, S_IN_STU_LM_C.Enddate as stu_lm_enddate, S_IN_STU_LM_C.ENG_Lang_Prof_Level as stu_lm_langproflevel, S_IN_STU_LM_C.Instructional_Program as stu_lm_instructprog, S_IN_STU_LM_C.Instrument_used as stu_lm_used, S_IN_STU_LM_C.Startdate as stu_lm_startdate, S_IN_STU_REFUGEE_C.Enddate as stu_refuse_enddate, S_IN_STU_REFUGEE_C.Notes as stu_refuse_notes, S_IN_STU_REFUGEE_C.Startdate as stu_refuse_startdate, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.BeginDate as stu_eval_begindate, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.DateofTermination as stu_eval_datetermination, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.ExceptionalityPrimary as stu_eval_exceptionalprimary, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.ExceptionalitySecondary as stu_evaluation_exceptionalsecondary, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.IEPReviewDate as stu_eval_iepreviewdate, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.LASTEVALUATIONDAT as stu_eval_lastevaldate S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.ParentalConsentDate as stu_eval_parentalconsentdate, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.SchoolID as stu_eval_schoolid, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.specialedPlacement as stu_eval_specialedplacement, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.SpecialeducationLocatio as stu_eval_specialedocation, S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.StudentEligibility as stu_eval_studenteligibility, S_IN_STU_SECTION504_C.Enddate as stu_section504_enddate, S_IN_STU_SECTION504_C.Notes as stu_section504_notes, S_IN_STU_SECTION504_C.Startdate as stu_section504_startdate, S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.Enddate as stu_title_enddate, S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.Startdate as stu_title_startdate, S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.ESEA_Title_I_Program as stu_title_program, S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.Title_I_Extended_Time as stu_title_i_extendime, S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.Title_I_Instruction as stu_title_i_instruct, S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.Title_I_Support as stu_title_i_support, S_IN_STU_UNACCOMPANIED_YOUTH_C.Enddate as stu_unacc_youth_endate, S_IN_STU_UNACCOMPANIED_YOUTH_C.Notes as stu_unacc_youth_notes, S_IN_STU_UNACCOMPANIED_YOUTH_C.Startdate as stu_unacc_youth_startate, S_IN_STU_VIRTUAL_C.enddate as stu_virtual_startate, S_IN_STU_VIRTUAL_C.Notes as stu_virtual_notes, S_IN_STU_VIRTUAL_C.startdate as stu_virtual_startdate, S_IN_STU_X.Access_School as stu_access_school, S_IN_STU_X.Accountable_School as stu_accountable_school, S_IN_STU_X.Active_Duty_Parent as stu_activeparent_duty, S_IN_STU_X.Adm_Type as stu_adm_type, S_IN_STU_X.AlternativeStudent as stu_alt_student, S_IN_STU_X.ASC_Graduate_TF as stu_asc_grad_tf, S_IN_STU_X.ChoiceScholarStu_YN as stu_choicescholarstu, S_IN_STU_X.Country_of_Origin as stu_country_origin, S_IN_STU_X.County_Residence as stu_country_residence, S_IN_STU_X.DOE_Diploma_Level as stu_doe_diploma_level, S_IN_STU_X.DOE_Diploma_Type as stu_doe_diploma_type, S_IN_STU_X.Employability_Skills as stu_emp_skills, S_IN_STU_X.ENG_Lang_Prof_Level as stu_eng_level, S_IN_STU_X.EntryDateIntoUSSchool as stu_entry_datetoschool, S_IN_STU_X.Esea_Title_I_Program as stu_esea_title_progam, S_IN_STU_X.Exceptionality_Primary as stu_except_primary, S_IN_STU_X.Exceptionality_Secondar as stu_except_secondary, S_IN_STU_X.Exclude_From_AT as stu_exclude_from_at, S_IN_STU_X.Exclude_From_GR as stu_exclude_from_gr, S_IN_STU_X.Exclude_From_LM_TF as stu_exclude_from_lm_tf, S_IN_STU_X.Exclude_From_ME_TF as stu_exclude_from_me_tf, S_IN_STU_X.Exclude_MinSecDays as stu_exclude_minsecdays, S_IN_STU_X.FAFSA_FILED as stu_fasa_filed, S_IN_STU_X.Foreign_Exchange_TF as stu_foreign_exchange_tf, S_IN_STU_X.Foster_Care as stu_forster_care, S_IN_STU_X.Graduation_Date as stu_grad_date, S_IN_STU_X.Half_Time_KG as stu_half_time_kg, S_IN_STU_X.HIGH_ABILITY as stu_hight_ability, S_IN_STU_X.HOMELESS as stu_homeless, S_IN_STU_X.Instructional_Days as stu_instruct_days, S_IN_STU_X.Instructional_Minutes as stu_instruct_mins, S_IN_STU_X.LEP_YN as stu_lep_yn, S_IN_STU_X.Local_Pathway as stu_local_pathway, S_IN_STU_X.Migrant_TF as stu_migrant_tf, S_IN_STU_X.Mothers_Maiden_Name as stu_mother_maiden_name, S_IN_STU_X.NATIVE_LANGUAGE_C as stu_native_lang_c, S_IN_STU_X.Post_Graduate_Info as stu_post_grad_info, S_IN_STU_X.Postsecondary_Compete as stu_post_sec_compete, S_IN_STU_X.PrimarySchoolEnrollmen as stu_primaryschoolenroll, S_IN_STU_X.Publish_SPED as stu_publish_sped, S_IN_STU_X.Refugee_Program as stu_refugee_program, S_IN_STU_X.Section_504_Plan_TF as stu_section504_plan_tf, S_IN_STU_X.Servicing_School as stu_servicing_school, S_IN_STU_X.Special_Education_TF as stu_specialEd_tf, S_IN_STU_X.TeacherOfRecord as stu_teacherofrecord, S_IN_STU_X.Title_I_Participant_TF as stu_particiapnt_tf, S_IN_STU_X.Unaccompanied_Youth as stu_unaccompanied_youth, S_IN_STU_X.VirtualStudent as stu_virtual_student FROM Students LEFT JOIN PersonEmailAddressAssoc ON PersonEmailAddressAssoc.PersonID = Students.Person_ID AND PersonEmailAddressAssoc.IsPrimaryEmailAddress = 1 LEFT JOIN EmailAddress ON EmailAddress.EmailAddressID = PersonEmailAddressAssoc.EmailAddressID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_X ON S_IN_STU_X.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_ACTIVE_DUTY_C ON S_IN_STU_ACTIVE_DUTY_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_ALTERNATIVE_EDU_C ON S_IN_STU_ALTERNATIVE_EDU_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_FOSTER_CARE_C ON S_IN_STU_FOSTER_CARE_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_FRGNEXCHNG_C ON S_IN_STU_FRGNEXCHNG_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_HIGH_ABILITY_C ON S_IN_STU_HIGH_ABILITY_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_HOMELESS_C ON S_IN_STU_HOMELESS_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_LM_C ON S_IN_STU_LM_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_REFUGEE_C ON S_IN_STU_REFUGEE_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_SECTION504_C ON S_IN_STU_SECTION504_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_TITLE_C ON S_IN_STU_TITLE_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_UNACCOMPANIED_YOUTH_C ON S_IN_STU_UNACCOMPANIED_YOUTH_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_VIRTUAL_C ON S_IN_STU_VIRTUAL_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID LEFT JOIN S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C ON S_IN_STU_SE_EVALUATION_C.StudentsDCID = Students.DCID

query.name: com.authentica.seed.students.race
query.sql: SELECT Students.Student_Number as student_id, Gen.value as Race, Gen.valueT as race_description, Gen.value2 as sif_race_code from StudentRace inner join Students on Students.ID = StudentRace.StudentId inner join Gen on Gen.cat = 'Race' and Gen.value = StudentRace.RaceCD
